name: Rosewood London
description: Rosewood London combines English heritage with contemporary sophistication in the very heart of the capital. The Grade II-listed, building has been renovated to provide accommodation with the feel of a stylish London residence. The guestrooms and suites are inspired by a traditional British manor house. The restaurants and bars are destinations in their own right. Recreational facilities include the Sense, A Rosewood Spa, Rosewood's signature spa brand, and a well-equipped fitness suite.

name: Park Grand London Kensington
description: Finding an ideal charming hotel in London does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Park Grand London Kensington, a nice option for travelers like you. Free Wi-Fi is offered to guests, and rooms at Park Grand Kensington offer a flat screen TV, a minibar, and air conditioning. During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. Guests of Park Grand Kensington are also welcome to enjoy a fitness center and breakfast, located on site. For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting London, Park Grand Kensington Hotel is located a short distance from Harrods (1.3 mi) and Buckingham Palace (2.2 mi). During your visit, be sure to check out one of London's popular schnitzel restaurants such as The Wolseley, Oslo Court, and Granger & Co, all a short distance from Park Grand London Kensington. If you’re looking for something to do, Natural History Museum (0.7 mi), V&A - Victoria and Albert Museum (0.9 mi), and Science Museum (0.7 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of Shaftesbury Kensington. Park Grand London Kensington puts the best of London at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.
address: 33 / 37 Hogarth Road Kensington, London SW5 0QQ England

name: Royal Lancaster London
description: As one of the few remaining independently owned hotels in the capital, Royal Lancaster London stands proudly on the border of Hyde Park, offering breathtaking views of the famous London skyline. All 411 beautiful guestrooms have been impeccably designed to combine timeless style, sumptuous comfort and incredible city views, ensuring every stay in London is truly unforgettable. The collection of spacious and elegant suites include the signature Royal and Lancaster Suites on the 18th floor – the pinnacle of luxury with unparalleled views of Hyde Park and the Italian Gardens. Guests can enjoy a selection of restaurants and bars onsite including the award-winning Nipa Thai, serving the most authentic Thai food outside of Bangkok, Hyde Café for artisan coffee and delicious pastries and Park Lounge Bar, offering a carefully-crafted cocktail menu and relaxed dining. The beautiful Park Restaurant, with stunning floor to ceiling views of Hyde Park, serves a delicious breakfast every morning. Superbly located in the heart of London, the hotel is adjacent to Lancaster Gate Underground Station and a 5 minute walk away from Paddington Station, offering easy access to Heathrow Airport in just 15 minutes. For those who love to shop, Marble Arch, Oxford Street and Knightsbridge can all be reached within 30 minutes by foot. For business travellers; London’s financial district is just a 20 minute tube ride from Lancaster Gate Station.

name: The Langham, London
description: With a history of delighting guests and providing personalised service since 1865, The Langham, London is truly a London icon. With the recent addition of deluxe suites, British tavern, The Wigmore, new spa and Michel's Roux restaurant the reimagining of Europe's first Grand Hotel is ever evolving.

name: Sea Containers London
description: Sea Containers London, formerly Mondrian. Experience sophisticated design, unique boutique hotel, luxury dining and award-winning bars. Book Direct & Save!

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London -Tower of London
description: At DoubleTree by Hilton, we know that the little things mean everything. These days, travel can be hard. At DoubleTree by Hilton we understand that, and every little thing we do adds up to creating a rewarding experience for our guests. This is evidenced through the signature warm chocolate chip cookies guests receive upon arrival, the advantages of the award-winning Hilton HHonors(R) guest reward program and our industry-recognized Culture of CARE that's been part of our DNA since 1985.

name: Sunborn London
description: Sunborn London is located at the western end of the Royal Victoria Dock overlooking the Docklands, Canary Wharf O2 Arena, London City Airport, and the ExCel where one can enjoy the panoramic views of their private settings. Travelling on the DLR towards Beckton alighting from Custom House Excel DLR station, it is a 3-5 minute walk which is a short distance from the main entrance of the ExCel London. For a more scenic journey one can enjoy taking the Emirates Cable Car journey from the North Greenwich O2 Arena to the Royal Victoria Dock, where you can enjoy a walk along the pier t taking in what the local area has to offer whilst visiting Sunborn London.
address: Royal Victoria Dock, London E16 1SJ England

name: Kimpton Fitzroy London
description: At Kimpton Fitzroy London, we have stories galore to tell. From the outside, the palatial 19th-century landmark building, which occupies a full block in Bloomsbury, looks the part of grande dame. Inside are contemporary creature comforts like roomy, art-filled suites with views over Russell Square, and destinations restaurants and bars that'll take your breath away. Fitz's, a glamorous drinking den that keeps the cocktails flowing; Burr & Co., a casually cool coffee shop; and Fitz's Brasserie, a contemporary Brasserie serving classic dishes with global influences, for everyone to enjoy. All of these details beckon modern travelers to settle in, and stay a while.
address: 1-8 Russell Square Bloomsbury, London WC1B 5BE England

name: Travelodge London City Hotel
description:
Travelodge London City hotel is an excellent choice for travelers visiting London, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.
You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer a flat screen TV, and you can stay connected during your stay as Travelodge London City hotel offers guests paid wifi.
Plus, Travelodge London City hotel offers an on-site restaurant, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day.
Nearby landmarks such as Covent Garden (2.1 mi) and Coca-Cola London Eye (2.1 mi) make Travelodge London City hotel a great place to stay when visiting London.
While in London, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Travelodge London City hotel, including Coppa Club - Tower Bridge (0.5 mi), Duck and Waffle (0.3 mi), and Aqua Shard (0.9 mi).
Looking to explore? Then look no further than Tower of London (0.5 mi), Sky Garden (0.5 mi), and The View from The Shard (0.9 mi), which are some popular London attractions – all conveniently located within walking distance of the hotel.
Enjoy your stay in London!

name: Montcalm Royal London House
description: Experience the epitome of luxury living at Montcalm Royal London House, where every detail has been meticulously crafted to ensure an unforgettable stay. Indulge your senses at our exclusive spa, where expert therapists offer a range of indulgent treatments designed to rejuvenate mind, body, and soul. Take a dip in our indoor warm swimming pool, or simply relax in the serene ambiance of our relaxation area, leaving the stresses of the day far behind. For discerning food enthusiasts, our hotel offers a culinary journey like no other. Ascend to the heights of gastronomic delight at Aviary, our rooftop restaurant boasting panoramic city views and exquisite fine dining options. Budrock beckons with its casual yet chic ambiance, serving up a delectable fusion of café, bar, and restaurant delights. And for those craving a taste of local flavour, Long Arm Pub awaits, showcasing its own brewery alongside a menu of hearty pub fare.
address: 22-25 Finsbury Square Royal London House, London EC2A 1DX England
